amendment.description: To require the withdrawal of the United States Armed Forces from Iraq and urge the convening of an Iraq summit.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4269 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 6. Record Vote Number: 174.

Amendment SA 4269 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 4265. (consideration: CR S5927-5929; text: CR S5927) To require the withdrawal of the United States Armed Forces from Iraq and urge the convening of an Iraq summit.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4269 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 6. Record Vote Number: 174.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4269 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 4265.
